means: [人名] [爱尔兰姓氏] 达利 Daly的变体

sentence.Network_en: He did not dally over the choice of a partner.
sentence.Network_cn: 他没有在选择合伙人的问题上浪费时间。

sentence.Network_en: Don't dally: we must move on.
sentence.Network_cn: 别耽误时间了,我们得继续赶路.

sentence.Network_en: Don't dilly - dally ! Make up your mind!
sentence.Network_cn: 别磨蹭了! 拿定主意罢!

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French dalier 'to chat' (commonly used in Anglo-Norman French), of unknown origin

entry.def: If you dally, you act or move very slowly, wasting time.

example.ex: He did not dally over the choice of a partner.
example.tran: 他没有在选择合伙人的问题上浪费时间。

entry.def: If someone dallies with you, they have a romantic, but not serious, relationship with you.

example.ex: In the past he dallied with actresses and lady novelists.
example.tran: 他过去曾与许多女演员和女小说家调情。

sentences.sentence: "Play about with a young girl's affection"

means.word_mean: 3. talk or behave amorously, without serious intentions;

sentences.sentence: "The guys always try to chat up the new secretaries"
"My husband never flirts with other women"
"She plays with the thought of moving to Tasmania"

auth_sentence.content: He liked to dally with pretty and sycophantic women.
auth_sentence.res_content: He liked to dally with pretty and sycophantic women.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He liked to dally with pretty and sycophantic women.

auth_sentence.content: Eisenman's nutty epicureans drink and dally in cunningly slovenly paintings.
auth_sentence.res_content: Eisenman's nutty epicureans drink and dally in cunningly slovenly paintings.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Eisenman's nutty epicureans drink and dally in cunningly slovenly paintings.

auth_sentence.content: "There's an enormous amount of capital that's highly motivated to make sure this continues," said Nvidia's Dally.
auth_sentence.res_content: "There's an enormous amount of capital that's highly motivated to make sure this continues," said Nvidia's Dally.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "There's an enormous amount of capital that's highly motivated to make sure this continues," said Nvidia's Dally.

means.word_mean: 随随便便地对待;不很认真地考虑

sentences.en: He dallied with the idea of becoming an actor.
sentences.cn: 他对当演员一事考虑过, 但并不认真。

sentences.en: They’ve been dallying with the idea for years.
sentences.cn: 他们多年来一直有这个想法,但从没有认真考虑过。

sentences.en: Don’t dally: we must move on.
sentences.cn: 别耽误时间了,我们得继续赶路。
